title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr, Llanfairpwll, Anglesey.
title.cy: Cangen Merched y Wawr Llanfairpwll, Rhanbarth Môn. Carnifal Llanfairpwll o 1974

description.en: Tim pel-droed “Rhyfeddodau’r Wawr” yng Ngharnifal Llanfairpwll o 1974. Benthycwyd y dillad gan dîm pel-droed y pentref a chalet tractor a trol T.C.Roberts yw clubdo. -Ennillwyd y wobr gymtaf! (Cefn) Annie Jones, Eluned Jones, Eirian Williams, Eirian Gibson, Myrna Williams, Myfanwy Bennett Jones, Peggy Mummery, Mrs Williams, (Penlinio) Betty Thomas, Eirlys Griffith, Beryl Hughes, Nan Hughes, Wenna Williams a Gwyneth Williams.
description.cy: Tim pel-droed “Rhyfeddodau’r Wawr” yng Ngharnifal Llanfairpwll o 1974. Benthycwyd y dillad gan dîm pel-droed y pentref a chalet tractor a trol T.C.Roberts yw clubdo. -Ennillwyd y wobr gymtaf! (Cefn) Annie Jones, Eluned Jones, Eirian Williams, Eirian Gibson, Myrna Williams, Myfanwy Bennett Jones, Peggy Mummery, Mrs Williams, (Penlinio) Betty Thomas, Eirlys Griffith, Beryl Hughes, Nan Hughes, Wenna Williams a Gwyneth Williams.
